SEARCH
Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.arrays.backend

Interface TensorScalarOpsMixin<T extends AbstractTensor<T,?,?>,U extends Field<U>>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of the tensor returned by the operation.
U - Type of the scalar field element.
public interface TensorScalarOpsMixin<T extends AbstractTensor<T,?,?>,U extends Field<U>>
This interface defines scalar operations between a tensor and a scalar field element.
See Also:
  • TensorPrimitiveOpsMixin

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    add(U a)
    Adds a scalar value to each element of this tensor.
    T
    div(U divisor)
    Computes the scalar division of this tensor and the specified scalar factor.
    T
    mult(U factor)
    Computes the scalar multiplication between this tensor and the specified scalar factor.
    U
    prod()
    Computes the product all elements of this tensor.
    T
    sub(U a)
    Subtracts a scalar value from each element of this tensor.
    U
    sum()
    Sums all elements of this tensor.

  • Method Details

    • add

      T add(U a)
      Adds a scalar value to each element of this tensor.
      Parameters:
      a - Value to add to each entry of this tensor.
      Returns:
      The result of adding the specified scalar value to each entry of this tensor.

    • sub

      T sub(U a)
      Subtracts a scalar value from each element of this tensor.
      Parameters:
      a - Value to subtract from each entry of this tensor.
      Returns:
      The result of subtracting the specified scalar value from each entry of this tensor.

    • mult

      T mult(U factor)
      Computes the scalar multiplication between this tensor and the specified scalar factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - Scalar factor to apply to this tensor.
      Returns:
      The scalar product of this tensor and factor.

    • div

      T div(U divisor)
      Computes the scalar division of this tensor and the specified scalar factor.
      Parameters:
      divisor - The scalar value to divide this tensor by.
      Returns:
      The result of dividing this tensor by the specified scalar.

      Sums all elements of this tensor.

      Computes the product all elements of this tensor.
